LABEL: Undead decay
TEXT: At the start of your turn, your undead decay.
You lose one third (rounded up) of your #yZombies and #ySkeletons each turn. This means the first #ySkeleton only lasts for 1 turn, but the third lasts for 3 turns.

LABEL: Skeleton attacks
TEXT: Your #ySkeletons attack random enemies at the end of your turn.
The damage of #ySkeletons is increased by half your #yStrength (rounded down).

LABEL: Zombie block
TEXT: If you haven't fully blocked damage, some of your #yZombies will take the hit for you. If a #yZombie blocks for more than enough, you even get the leftover #yBlock.
The block of #yZombies is increased by half your #yDexterity (rounded down).

LABEL: Wraiths
TEXT: If you would take more than 1 damage from an attack, one of your #yWraiths will sacrifice itself to grant you intangibility.
At the beginning of your turn, a #yWraith dissipates, dealing damage to all enemies.
